ran3 se4 ti3 san1 bei4 ti3 zheng4

sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the regularity of various chromosome anomalies among heredity inquires.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨各类遗传咨询者染色体核型异常发生规律。

sentences.english: Some questions about the chromosomal evolution of Vicia are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文还对野豌豆属染色体进化的有关问题进行了讨论。

sentences.english: X inactivation starts at the X inactivation center(XIC) and spreads throughout the chromosome.
sentences.chinese: 失活开始于XIC，然后传播到整条染色体。

sentences.english: The position of the centromere and the behavior of chromosomes during meiosis also important.
sentences.chinese: 着丝粒的位置和染色体在减数分裂中的行为也很重要。

sentences.english: For example, the medical community uses RDF to describe genomic databases.
sentences.chinese: 例如，医学组织使用RDF来表述染色体组数据库。

sentences.english: The cell at the top is at prophase, showing the condensing chromosomes prior to their separation.
sentences.chinese: 上面的细胞处于分裂前期，凝集的染色体将要分开。

sentences.english: The karyotype analysis of Tradescantia virginiana L. (Commelinaceae).
sentences.chinese: 大花紫露草染色体核型的研究。

sentences.english: Chromosome numbers and karyotype analysis of 9 species in Hydrocharitaceae.
sentences.chinese: 九种水鳖科植物染色体数目及其核型分析。

sentences.english: The secondary constriction has been observed on the centromere region of the chromosome No.
sentences.chinese: 染色体短臂近着丝粒区观察到次缢痕。

sentences.english: Chromosomal anomaly are associated with abnormal childbearing.
sentences.chinese: 染色体异常与不良生育史有关系。

sentences.english: Bivalent Describing any pair of homologous chromosomes when they pair up during MEIOSIS.
sentences.chinese: 在减数分裂中配对时的任意一对同源染色体。

sentences.english: Result showed that anomalous chromosome is one cause of recurrent abortion.
sentences.chinese: 说明了染色体异常是导致反复性流产的原因之一。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sex chromosome aberration is the most important cause that results in sex differential distortion.
sentences.chinese: 结论性染色体异常是导致性分化异常的重要原因之一。

sentences.english: Trichothiodystrophy is a rare hair disorder inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern.
sentences.chinese: 毛发缺硫性失养症为一少见的常染色体隐性毛发疾病。

sentences.english: Conclusion The abnormality of chromosome is one of the basic reasons of disfavorable pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 结论染色体异常是导致不良孕产史的重要原因。

sentences.english: The rod-shaped filaments of the microtubules are responsible for dividing the chromosomes in a cell.
sentences.chinese: 微管杆形丝担负划分细胞中染色体的角色。

definition: allele (one of two paired gene in diploid organism)
